channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 19:27 Driven anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.

item.title: 🟡 19:27 Dumping anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 19:27 Dumping anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
